text:
I try to make XML-RPC calls by generating directly the http posts with the
following request : 

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<methodCall>
   <methodName>getDocument</methodName>
   <params>
      <param><value><string>/db/applications</string></value></param>
   </params>
   </methodCall>



I always get this answer : 



<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<methodResponse>
<fault>
<value>
<struct>
<member>
<name>faultString
</name>
<value>java.lang.Exception: RPC handler object not found for "getDocument": no
default handler registered.
</value>
</member>
<member>
<name>faultCode
</name>
<value>
<int>0
</int>
</value>
</member>
</struct>
</value>
</fault>
</methodResponse>

The problem is the same with each method I try to call (insertDocument, etc...)

Please HELP!!
creator: alexander.dejanovski@laposte.net
Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
text: please post question to xindice-users.  if no response, submit to xindice-dev
